Description: Civil engineering design fees — DEL-03-01 share (site plan / circulation / parking layout design)
SourceRef: Professional_Design_Fees.csv DF-02 + Assumed_Project_Parameters.csv PP-23; apportionment per ASM-001
Notes: DF-02 rate: 2.5% of site/civil construction cost ($1,800,000 PP-23) = $45,000 total civil design fee. DEL-03-01 apportioned at 30% = $13,500. See ASM-001 for apportionment basis. PP-23 is LOW confidence.

Description: Construction survey and staking — initial site layout (DEL-03-01 share)
Notes: EC-11 full site survey = $12,000 LS. DEL-03-01 share (initial layout/staking) apportioned at ~42% = $5,000. Remaining survey effort (progress + as-built) belongs to DEL-01-07 / other deliverables. See ASM-002.
